biography: Pakishe Aaron Motsoaledi is a South African politician. He is the Minister of Health in the cabinet of South Africa, having been appointed to this position with effect on 3 July 2024. He was previously the Minister of Home Affairs from 2019 to 2024 as well as the Minister of Health from 2009 to 2019. A member of the National Assembly since 2009, he is also a member of the National Executive Committee of the African National Congress (ANC).
